name: Asteroids - Remake
description:
Asteroids - Remake is a game made within a week. It is a rather simple clone build. The game idea was taken from a tutorial series on YouTube referring to the Game Maker Studio Engine and then coded in Lua - Love2d Engine.

Controls

To move around the screen use the Left/Right arrows on your keyboard:

To use the thrusters use the Up arrow key on your keyboard:
